item.title: Do You Know the Secret to Spelling 'Cognac' Correctly? Find Out Now!
item.description: Do You Know the Secret to Spelling ‘Cognac’ Correctly? Find Out Now! Cognac is a type of brandy, made from white grapes and distilled twice in copper pot stills, that is known for its smooth flavor and aroma. Many people enjoy it as an after-dinner drink or in cocktails. However, when it comes to spelling it correctly, many people struggle. Fortunately, there are a few steps you can take to ensure you never misspell it again.
